arguments.argument:
// To insert a new line add the #
draw_set_color(c_white) draw_set_font(fnt_creditos) draw_set_halign(fa_center)
draw_sprite(spr_logo,-20,x,y) // Logo
draw_text(x,y+128,"Programmers") draw_text(x,y+160,"William Blankenship#Richard Smith#Johnna Lockard")
draw_text(x,y+256,"History") draw_text(x,y+288,"Shok and Awe was created by programers wanting to do something different.")
draw_text(x,y+375,"Art Work") draw_text(x,y+410,"Capcom#RyanMc#PinedaVX#Billy Howell")
draw_text(x,y+544,"Music") draw_text(x,y+575,"Found at free music sites on the web")
draw_text(x,y+620,"Special Resources") draw_text(x,y+655,"The Game Maker Companion#By Jacob Habgood, Nana Nielsen, and Martin Rijles")
draw_text(x,y+740,"Special Thanks") draw_text(x,y+780,"William's Dad#Johnna's Husband#Rick's girlfriend (Tracy)#GSP Testers")
draw_text(x,y+940,"Copyright ï¿½ 2011 BSL Creations")
